A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:

The decision to kill off snoke so early is pathetic \, snoke to people like me is an interesting character where you want to know more about him and in my opinion would've added a big chunk to the story but the fact that they killed him off only to make kylo ren the bigger character is repulsive.

At first watching the film it was good  and I enjoyed it but as soon as It came to the scene where snoke is killed off I thought wow that sucks

 in them .
